amendment.description: To provide funds for the National Research Council study on acidification of the oceans as authorized by the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Reauthorization Act of 2006.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3251 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3251 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S12844; text: CR S12844) To provide funds for the National Research Council study on acidification of the oceans as authorized by the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Reauthorization Act of 2006.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3251 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3251 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Lautenberg.
